Key Match Events: Roston Chase scored 42 off 27 balls to help West Indies win the match
Sese Bau scored 50 off 43 balls for Papua New Guinea
Rovman Powell was caught by Kiplin Doriga off Chad Soper for 15
Sherfane Rutherford was caught by Kiplin Doriga off Assad Vala for 2
Johnson Charles was lbw to Alei Nao for 0
Nicholas Pooran was caught by Tony Ura off John Kariko for 27
Brandon King was caught by Lega Siaka off Assad Vala for 34
Andre Russell was not out for 15 off 9 balls
Post-Match Reflections: Roston Chase was awarded the Player of the Match for his contribution
West Indies won by 5 wickets with 6 balls remaining
Miscellaneous Highlights: Papua New Guinea scored 136/8 in 20 overs
Assad Vala was awarded the CRICINFO's MVP for his performance
